alert.note: Alert for West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 6:19AM MST until January 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. A period of rain and freezing rain is expected this morning. Black ice formation is a concern due to cold ground temperatures, even in locations where the air temperature is above freezing. * WHERE...Bad Rock Canyon, Essex, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan Lake, Marias Pass, and Polebridge. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially secondary roads and sidewalks.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
